title: Fix regression: Click to speak not working after stop button fix

comments.author: shoe
comments.text: Fixed: Added prevIsListeningRef to track previous listening state. The regression occurred because the new reset-to-IDLE logic would trigger immediately after clicking to speak, before speech recognition actually started (isListening was still false but voiceState was LISTENING). The fix ensures we only reset to IDLE when isListening transitions from true to false, not on the initial state where it's false because recognition hasn't started yet. Changes: packages/nova-web/src/App.tsx. Verified: TypeScript type-check passes, build passes.

4. PM steps away - no session timeout
5. Noisy environment - clear recording indicator, text fallback available
6. External API failures - retry with backoff, graceful degradation to text mode
7. User interrupts TTS - stop button halts audio immediately
8. Concurrent audio - auto-pause TTS when recording starts
9. Long Claude responses - sentence-chunked TTS streaming
10. High network latency - processing indicators via connection status
11. Browser denies microphone - permissionDenied state shows text as primary
12. Multiple tabs - session locking with 'session active elsewhere' error
13. Spec file save failure - retry with backoff, content preserved in client
14. WebSocket reconnection - exponential backoff (2s to 30s max), status indicator
